dmca.title: [ABUSE] Re: Notice of Continued Infringement [Notice ID: 1834437]
dmca.body:
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1



Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.

- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/


This is a forwarded message
From: antipiracy@titanmedia.com <antipiracy@titanmedia.com>
To: abuse@theplanet.com
Date: Thursday, February 3, 2005, 11:18:17 AM
Subject: [ABUSE] Re: Notice of Continued Infringement  [Notice ID: 1834437]

===8<==============Original message text===============
- -----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

To:
Registered Agent for: ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.
1333 Stemmons Frwy - Suite 110




Notice ID: 1834437


From: Gill Sperlein, General Counsel, Titan Media, Inc.

Date: 3 Feb 2005 17:19:43 GMT

Re:         Notice of DMCA Claim of Infringement


I previously sent you (a) valid DMCA notice(s) regarding infringement of
TITAN Media copyright protected works from the IP address identified below.
You either replied with an automated message with no follow-up,  you didn't
reply at all or you replied but I never received your message.   In any
event you either did not contact your subscriber or he has ignored the
notices, as the violations continue.    Your subscriber has either continued
to make the same files available through your network, has made additional
TITAN Media owned files available through your network or both.  Please
contact the subscriber immediately and demand that he discontinue this
illegal practice.  The subscriber's violations are listed below.  If the
infringing activity continues after providing the subscriber notice, we
request you discontinue service to the subscriber.  If you do not take
immediate action ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. will be at risk of
being liable for contributory or vicarious infringement.

I certify under penalty of perjury that I have a good faith belief the
information contained in this notification is accurate to the best of my
knowledge, and that I am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of the
aforementioned copyright-protected materials.

If you should wish to contact me to discuss this matter, you may telephone
me at 415-487-1211 X32 or e-mail me at legal@titanmedia.com.

Please provide the following paragraph to your subscriber either by
forwarding this e-mail in its entirety or by cutting and pasting it into
your correspondence with the subscriber.  This may enable us to resolve the
issue and arrange for resititution without filing a law suit or issuing a
subpoena to ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc..

NOTE FROM TITAN MEDIA TO SUBSCRIBER OR ACCOUNT HOLDER:  YOU ARE AT RISK OF
BEING SUED FOR YOUR ILLEGAL ACTIONS.  TO DETERMINE HOW YOU MAY BE ABLE TO
AVOID A LAWSUIT, REFER TO www.titanlegal.com.

Sincerely,



D. Gill Sperlein
General Counsel, TITAN Media Inc.
121 Capp Street, Suite 200
San Francisco, CA 94110

415-487-1211 X32

Notice ID: 1834437

The following violations have occurred from the referenced IP address:

Title: Tourist Trade
Infringement Source: Gnutella
Infringement Timestamp: 14 Jan 2005 00:33:09 GMT
Infringement Last Documented: 3 Feb 2005 15:21:29 GMT
Infringer Username:
Infringing Filename: Gay Porn - TITAN - Tourist Trade  -  best movie ever
seen!!! [DVD2DIVX by K 9].wmv
Infringing Filesize: 2725080
Infringer IP Address: 67.18.213.18
Infringer DNS Name: 18.67-18-213.reverse.theplanet.com
Infringing URL:
- -----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: 8.0

iD8DBQFCAlzY5vz887oR+rARAmiPAKDxqCSSqfgBd/fNhDhHLLaLTRxE0ACfW1Uw
tTpm51/HIj5ESmmwck6L8ls=
=u01q
- -----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
